Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Stick = Tool.Handle
local stabAnim local slashAnim
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local bodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bodyVelocity.P = 10000 bodyVelocity.Name = "QuakeVel" bodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(10000, 10000, 10000)
local AOE = Vector3.new(15, 15, 15)
local anim
local damage = 14.5
local unequipped = false
local partsModel
local part = Instance.new("Part") part.FormFactor = 3 part.CanCollide = false part.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)
local bandanaMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") bandanaMesh.Name = "Bandana" bandanaMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=71545305" bandanaMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=71545324"
local bandanaC1 = CFrame.new(0, -0.300000012, -0.5, -1, 0, -8.74227766e-008, -8.74227766e-008, -2.18556949e-007, 1, -1.91068559e-014, 1, 2.18556949e-007)
local earringMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") earringMesh.Name = "Earring" earringMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=71545436" earringMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=71545324"
local earringC1 = CFrame.new(0, -0.599999964, 0, 1.91068547e-015, 4.37113883e-008, 1, 1, -4.37113883e-008, 0, 4.37113883e-008, 1, -4.37113883e-008)
local eyePatchMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") eyePatchMesh.Name = "EyePatch" eyePatchMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=71545496" eyePatchMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=71545324"
local eyePatchC1 = CFrame.new(0.25, 0.599999964, -0.24999997, -1, 3.49691135e-007, 4.37114061e-008, 4.37113776e-008, -8.74227766e-008, 1, 3.49691135e-007, 1, 8.74227695e-008)
local parrotMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") parrotMesh.Name = "Parrot" parrotMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=71545545" parrotMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=71545324"
local parrotC1 = CFrame.new(-0.799999952, -0.300000012, 0.75, -1, -1.91068542e-014, -8.74227766e-008, -8.74227766e-008, 2.18556949e-007, 1, 0, 1, -2.18556949e-007)
local meshes = {bandanaMesh, earringMesh, eyePatchMesh, parrotMesh}
-- Form Pirate local pirate = {} pirate["Hat"] = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(13477084):GetChildren()[1] pirate["Torso"] = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(27847359):GetChildren()[1] pirate["Left Arm"] = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(27847412):GetChildren()[1] pirate["Right Arm"] = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(27847382):GetChildren()[1] pirate["Left Leg"] = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(27847445):GetChildren()[1] pirate["Right Leg"] = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(27847473):GetChildren()[1] --
local stickWhackSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("StickWhackSound") if stickWhackSound == nil then stickWhackSound = Instance.new("Sound") stickWhackSound.Name = "StickWhackSound" stickWhackSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=46153268" stickWhackSound.Parent = Stick stickWhackSound.Volume = 1 end
function blow(hit) local character local nameCheck local foundIt = false if hit and hit.Parent then if hit.Parent.className == "Hat" and hit.Parent.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Stick or rightGrip.Part1 == Stick) then character = humanoid.Parent tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) if hit.Name == "Left Arm" then nameCheck = Enum.BodyPart.LeftArm elseif hit.Name == "Right Arm" then nameCheck = Enum.BodyPart.RightArm elseif hit.Name == "Right Leg" then nameCheck = Enum.BodyPart.RightLeg elseif hit.Name == "Left Leg" then nameCheck = Enum.BodyPart.LeftLeg elseif hit.Name == "Torso" then nameCheck = Enum.BodyPart.Torso elseif hit.Name == "Head" or (hit.Name == "Handle" and hit.Parent and hit.Parent.className == "Hat") then nameCheck = "Hat" end if character then local children = character:GetChildren() local head = character:FindFirstChild("Head") for i = 1, #children do if children[i].className == "CharacterMesh" and children[i].BodyPart == nameCheck then foundIt = true print("Removing ", children[i]) children[i]:Remove() if pirate[hit.Name] then pirate[hit.Name]:Clone().Parent = character end end if children[i].className == "Hat" and head then -- and nameCheck == "Hat" then --if pirate[nameCheck] and pirate[nameCheck]:FindFirstChild("Handle") then
local hat = Instance.new("Hat") local Hpart = pirate["Hat"].Handle:clone() Hpart.Parent = hat Hpart.Position = character.Head.Position hat.Name = "Spack Jarrow" --hat.Parent = character hat.AttachmentPos = pirate["Hat"].AttachmentPos hat.AttachmentRight = pirate["Hat"].AttachmentRight hat.AttachmentUp = pirate["Hat"].AttachmentUp hat.AttachmentForward = pirate["Hat"].AttachmentForward --end if children[i] then children[i]:Remove() end if character:FindFirstChild("PartsModel") then character.PartsModel:Destroy() end partsModel = Instance.new("Model") partsModel.Name = "PartsModel" partsModel.Parent = character for i = 1, #meshes do local p1 = part:Clone() meshes[i]:Clone().Parent = p1 p1.Name = i .. ""
local w1 = Instance.new("Weld") w1.Parent = head w1.Part0 = head w1.Part1 = p1
p1.Parent = partsModel if meshes[i].Name == "Bandana" then w1.C1 = bandanaC1 elseif meshes[i].Name == "Parrot" then w1.C1 = parrotC1 elseif meshes[i].Name == "Earring" then w1.C1 = earringC1 else w1.C1 = eyePatchC1 end end end end if foundIt == false then if hit.Name =="Head" or (hit.Name == "Handle" and hit.Parent and hit.Parent.className == "Hat") then if pirate[nameCheck] and pirate[nameCheck]:FindFirstChild("Handle") then local hat = Instance.new("Hat") local Hpart = pirate[nameCheck].Handle:clone() Hpart.Parent = hat Hpart.Position = character.Head.Position hat.Name = "Spack Jarrow" --hat.Parent = character hat.AttachmentPos = pirate[nameCheck].AttachmentPos hat.AttachmentRight = pirate[nameCheck].AttachmentRight hat.AttachmentUp = pirate[nameCheck].AttachmentUp hat.AttachmentForward = pirate[nameCheck].AttachmentForward end else if pirate[hit.Name] and pirate[hit.Name]:FindFirstChild("Handle") then local hat = Instance.new("Hat") local Hpart = pirate[hit.Name].Handle:clone() Hpart.Parent = hat Hpart.Position = character.Head.Position hat.Name = "Spack Jarrow" --hat.Parent = character hat.AttachmentPos = pirate[hit.Name].AttachmentPos hat.AttachmentRight = pirate[hit.Name].AttachmentRight hat.AttachmentUp = pirate[hit.Name].AttachmentUp hat.AttachmentForward = pirate[hit.Name].AttachmentForward end end end if myHumanoid.WalkSpeed < 20.0 then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 20.0 end coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(2.0) if myHumanoid then if unequipped == true then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 else myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 18.0 end end end)) end end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
tick()
Tool.Enabled = false
local rand = math.random(1, 2) anim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.Whack) if anim then anim:Play() end
stickWhackSound = Stick:FindFirstChild("StickWhackSound") if stickWhackSound then stickWhackSound:Play() end
Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0, -1) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0)
wait(0.5)
Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0.0, 1.0, 0.0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1.0, 0.0, 0.0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0.0, 0.0, 1.0)
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") unequipped = false end
function onUnequipped() if anim then anim:Stop() end if stickWhackSound then stickWhackSound:Stop() end unequipped = true if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Stick.Touched:connect(blow)
